description:
Get ready for an electrifying evening at the next PHPSW on Wednesday, August 14th! We’ve lined up two incredible sessions that you won’t want to miss...

Dreaming of growing your personal project into something bigger? Join Ferdie De Oliveria as he shares his story on scaling his personal project.

And if you’re hunting for your dream job, Beya Durante has got you covered! Dive into the current state of the PHP market, discover pro tips on how to stand out, and participate in an extensive Q&A session. Bring your burning questions and get ready to supercharge your career!

This is an event you can't afford to miss. See you there!

\-\-\-\-
SR2 – Socially Responsible Recruitment (https://www.sr2rec.co.uk/) are kindly helping us host this evening. Thanks to them!

Your first time coming to PHPSW? Welcome!
Here's how the evening tends to run:

* Feel free to turn up from 6:30pm.
* We'll have a selection of soft drinks & alcoholic drinks available from about 6:45pm, all free of charge thanks to our sponsors. It's a great chance to speak to people (we're a friendly bunch!) and do a bit of networking. Just speak to an organiser if you'd like an introduction to people, or just dive in and say "hello!".
* At 7pm, we'll do a quick welcome talk and some community announcements
* At \~7:10pm we'll start our talks
* We finish at \~9pm. We always go for a drink somewhere afterwards to discuss the talks and anything else that takes your fancy. 🐘
title: Scaling Personal Projects
